translation.intro1Des: Cultivate your products with care, harvest the rewards, and watch your business flourish on our farmers marketplace. Join us today and grow your success!
translation.intro2Des: List your products, sell them on our platform, and witness the prosperity that comes with reaching a wide customer base. Start selling today and unlock your full earning potential!
translation.intro3Des: Delight customers with your exceptional products, earn the recognition and money you truly deserve, and thrive in the farming industry. Join us and make your dreams a reality!
translation.name: Purify Yellow Wheat
translation.desripVal: Provide a brief overview of the product, highlighting its key features, benefits
translation.quality&FreshnessVal: Emphasize that the product is locally sourced from Pakistani farmers, ensuring freshness and quality.
translation.wheatmsg: When to buy Wheat in bulk.
translation.3rdMessage: Can you suggest me some hot deals...
translation.userAgrementDes:
- We value your privacy and handle your personal information with utmost care. Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data.
- No illegal stuff or prohibited activities, please! We reserve the right to suspend your account if you break the rules.
translation.privacyPolicyDes:
- We take your privacy seriously and handle your personal info according to our Privacy Policy.
- We may collect certain data, like your name and contact info, to improve our services.
translation.transactionDes:
Our app helps you buy and sell stuff, but we're not responsible for any issues between users.
- Payments are handled securely by our trusted payment partners. Check out our Payment and Refund Policy for more details.
translation.intellectualDes:
- All the cool content, trademarks, logos, and stuff within the app belong to KisanMart.
- Please don't use, copy, or distribute our stuff without permission.
translation.fraudulentDes:
- We take fraud seriously! If anyone tries to scam others, we'll take legal action against them.
- To maintain trust, both farmers and customers need to verify their identity before making deals.
translation.userDes:
- We want to maintain a positive and respectful community. Please treat others with kindness and refrain from engaging in any form of harassment or discrimination.
- It's important to follow our Code of Conduct to ensure that everyone feels safe and welcome while using our platform.
translation.terminationDes:
- In rare cases, we may need to terminate or suspend an account due to violations of our policies or for other valid reasons.
- We hope to maintain a positive and trustworthy community, but we also have measures in place to address any issues that may arise.
translation.contentDes:
- You are responsible for the content you post on our app.
- Ensure that your content is legal, appropriate, and doesn't infringe upon the rights of others.
translation.limitationDes:
- We strive to provide a great experience, but we can't guarantee the accuracy, availability, or reliability of our app at all times.
- We are not liable for any damages or losses incurred while using our app.
translation.dataProtectionDes:
- We take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information.
- Rest assured that we adhere to strict data protection practices to ensure the security and confidentiality of your data.
translation.informationCollectionDes:
- We collect certain information when you use our app, such as your username, email address, and device information.
- This information is necessary for us to provide you with a personalized and seamless experience on our platform.
translation.dataUsageDes:
- We use your data to improve our services, personalize your experience, and provide relevant content and recommendations.
- Your information may also be used for analytics purposes to help us understand user behavior and enhance our app's functionality.
translation.informationSharingDes:
- We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties.
- However, we may share your data with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in delivering our services to you.
translation.securityMeasuresDes:
- We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration.
- Our team is dedicated to ensuring the highest level of security to safeguard your information.
translation.childrenPrivacyDes:
Our app is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
- If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected data from a child, we will take immediate steps to delete it.
translation.updatesToThePrivacyPolicyDes:
- Our Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. We encourage you to review it periodically for any changes.
- We will notify you of any significant updates to the Privacy Policy through the app or other communication channels.
translation.notificaton1: Your Product 'Wheat' has been approved and is now live on listing.
translation.notificaton2: Your Product 'Rice' has been rejected and is not live on listing.
translation.notificaton3: Your deal with Ali khan is completed.
translation.notificaton4: Your deal with Chaman Baloch is pending.
translation.scanDes: Place the ID Card in the frame until all 4 edges align around the Card and turn green
translation.IDNote: The data you share will be encrypted, stored securely, and only used to verify your identity
